name: Gusuper
tagline: Library Website Super Search - Drupal Module
body:
This Drupal module provides a federated search experience across selected library resources.  Currently, those resources are

![Screen Shot](https://raw.github.com/Georgetown-University-Libraries/gusuper/gh-pages/images/super1.jpg)

### Searchable Resources

1. Library Website (Drupal, via ApacheSOLR)

1. LibraryGuides (SpringShare platform)

1. Institutional Repository (DSpace)

1. LibraryAnswers (SpringShare, not enabled)

1. Institutional Repository (DSpace, SOLR Service, not enabled)

1. Summon (coming soon!)

Federated searches are launced via Ajax.  If any single service is unavailble, the other searches will be returned.

### Module Pre-Requisites

1. ApacheSOLR module is in place

1. XSLT PHP module is enabled

1. SOLR client PHP module is enabled

### Module Installation

1. Install modules

1. Activate gusuper, configure module parameter

1. Activate desired external services, configure module(s) parameters

1. Activate search module via Drupal admin

1. Apply custom CSS

![Screen Shot](https://raw.github.com/Georgetown-University-Libraries/gusuper/gh-pages/images/super2.jpg)

![Screen Shot](https://raw.github.com/Georgetown-University-Libraries/gusuper/gh-pages/images/super3.jpg)
  
### Module Flow

1. User enters search

1. Search module is invoked

1. Search module returns a template listing the services to execute

1. Search modules invoke Drupal callbacks via Ajax

1. Federated search is executed and returned to the ajax callback

### You can preview the functionality at the following URL.
* http://www.library.georgetown.edu/search/gusupersearch/test%20search
